name: Five Nights at Treasure Island: The Revenge
name_original: Five Nights at Treasure Island: The Revenge
description:
Treasure Island... It's not the end yet... there's still one thing that's not finished... The contract with her. Will you escape them? will you accept your Fate? will you drown in despair? or will you discover our... Little secret? Dohna is a woman, Where she is from? What is she? She has some unfinished business in Treasure Island that has since been taken over by a corporation known as SEA (Supernatural Entertainment Association, Formerly; SSA) they have turned the island into a Horror attraction. Why was this change done? What happened to the original? Dohna started working in the island to remember her past, but after signing a contract She is now being haunted by ghost and toons. What was the contract? why do they hunt her? Find out in Five Nights at Treasure Island: The Revenge.

"20 Years have passed since we are waiting for revenge"

"Five Nigths at Treasure Island: The revenge" is an Unofficial spin-off to the original game made by AnArt1996.

Game has been released.

Wiki: http://fnati-the-revenge.wikia.com/wiki/Five_Night...:_The_Revenge_Wikia
